p: As aforementioned, herbal extracts and EOs from plants can be considered as potential alternatives to artificial preservatives to improve the shelf life and the safety of food products such as meat and poultry and RTE meat products ( 49). EOs, which also known as volatile or ethereal oils, are naturally aromatic components found in many plants. They can be obtained from various parts of plants including buds, flowers, seeds, leaves, roots, peels, fruits, barks, and woods through only physical extraction and isolation such as pressing and distillation ( 3, 49).
